name: Java Business Rule Management System
short_description: Open source, Java-based Business Rules Management System. Built on standards like JSR94, RuleML,SBVR,JBI etc. and work across different rule engines like JBoss Rules(DRools),Mandrax etc. Uses Java Content Repository and is database agnostic.
